title: I DON'T GET IP ???
body:
I PLAY 10+ GAMES AND DON'T GET IP ****.

FİRST DİSCUSSİON DELETE SUPPORT ???????????

replies.body:
The EUW server experienced some technical issues that caused some IP to be missing from matches. We've resolved this issue and you should see an IP credit for the missing amounts.

Let me know if you're still having issues with this.

I have the same problem.
I had 1514 IP.
I played 8 games but the amount is not changed.
To check, I bought three runes value of 1 IP, now i have 1511.
